channel.title: photography on Ross Knapman
channel.description: Recent content in photography on Ross Knapman

item.title: Photography
item.description: As a teenager, I was quite into photography, especially after my parents got me a Canon EOS 600D for Christmas when I was 15. Although I don’t really do so much of this at the moment, here is a collection of photos that I have taken in various places around the world.
